ISSUE.TITLE: Add FC/UPC, FC/APC and FC/PC port types
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### NetBox version v4.2.3 ### Feature type Change to existing functionality ### Proposed functionality Add FC/UPC, FC/APC and FC/PC port types ### Use case With issue #8736 additional port types were added for LC and SC connectors. FC connectors are also available with different end faces. It is essential to know which connector (FC/PC, FC/APC or FC/UPC) is used. If one takes the wrong patchcable, the connector (port) could be destroyed. ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/07e7896c-035e-4084-9271-3250bd82a533) ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/27c0c662-9533-4efa-993e-94bf48728c76) ### Database changes _No response_ ### External dependencies _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #18308 from netbox-community/feature Prep for v4.2.0 release

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #18816:Add FC/UPC, FC/APC and FC/PC port types
